content.text:
# 1993 Bangladesh President's Gold Cup

Petrolul Ploiești
| count          = 1
| second_other   =  Polonia Warsaw
| third_other    =  Krylya Sovetov
| matches        = 16
| goals          = 42
| attendance     =
| prevseason     = 1989
| nextseason     =
| player         =
| goalkeeper     =
| top_scorer     =  Choi Tae Ho   Florin Simion   Vladimir Filippov  (3 goals)
}}
The '''1993 Bangladesh President's Gold Cup''' was the seventh and final edition of the Bangladesh President's Gold Cup. The event was held at the Mirpur Stadium in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
